author: Soo Kim
title: Japanese PM Urges Nation to Stay at Home While Awkwardly Petting a Dog in Video
description: Japan has avoided the explosion of cases that its neighbors, China and South Korea, have seen, but cases have been rising in its capital Tokyo.
content:
Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe has urged the country to remain at home to help combat the novel coronavirus outbreak in Japan with a video message also featuring Japanese singer and actor Gen Hoshino.
Abe is seen engaged in different activities, from awk… [+6097 chars]
